COL 3.15 jah gawairþi gudis swignjai in hairtam izwaraim, in þammei jah laþodai wesuþ in ainamma leika, jah awiliudondans wairþaiþ.
COL 3.16 waurd Xristaus bauai in izwis gabigaba,
in allai handugein jah frodein ahmeinai laisjandans jah talzjandans izwis silbans psalmom, hazeinim, saggwim ahmeinaim,
in anstai siggwandans in hairtam izwaraim fraujin.
COL 3.17 all þisƕah þatei taujaiþ in waurda aiþþau in waurstwa, all in namin fraujins Iesuis, awiliudondans guda attin þairh ina.
COL 3.18 jus qinons, ufhausjaiþ wairam izwaraim, swe gaqimiþ in fraujin.
COL 3.19 wairos, frijoþ qenins izwaros jah ni sijaiþ baitrai wiþra þos.
COL 3.20 barna, ufhausjaiþ fadreinam bi all;
unte þata waila galeikaiþ ist in fraujin.
COL 3.21 jus attans, ni gramjaiþ barna izwara du þwairhein, ei ni wairþaina in unlustau.
COL 3.22 þewisa, ufhausjaiþ bi all þaim bi leika fraujam, ni in augam skalkinondans, swe mannam samjandans, ak in ainfalþein hairtins, ogandans guþ.
COL 3.23 þisƕah þatei taujaiþ, us saiwalai waurkjaiþ swe fraujin, ni mannam, COL 3.24 witandans þatei af fraujin nimiþ andalauni arbjis;
COL 3.25 sa auk skaþaila andnimiþ þatei skoþ, jah nist wiljahalþein at guda.
COL 4.1 Jus fraujans, garaiht jah ibnassu þewisam atkunnaiþ, witandans þatei aihuþ jah jus fraujan in himinam.
COL 4.2 bidai haftjandans izwis, wakandans in izai in awiliudam;
COL 4.3 bidjandans samana jah bi uns ei guþ uslukai unsis haurd waurdis du rodjan runa Xristaus, in þizozei jah gabundans im, ...
COL 4.5 in handugein gaggaiþ du þaim uta, mel usbugjandans.
COL 4.6 waurd izwar sinteino in anstai salta gasupoþ sijai, ei witeiþ ƕaiwa skuleiþ ainƕarjammeh andhafjan.

COL 4.7 þatei bi mik ist, all gakanneiþ izwis Twkeikus, sa liuba broþar jah triggwa andbahts jah gaskalki in fraujin, COL 4.8 þanei insandida du izwis duþe ei kunnjai ƕa bi izwis ist, jah gaþrafstjai hairtona izwara, COL 4.9 miþ Aunisimau þamma liubin jah triggwin broþr, saei ist us izwis,
þaiei all izwis gakannjand þatei her ist.

COL 4.10 goleiþ izwis Aristarkus, sa miþfrahunþana mis, jah Markus gadiliggs Barnabins, bi þanei nemuþ anabusnins, ei jabai qimai at izwis, andnimaiþ ina; COL 4.11 jah Iesus, saei haitada Justus, þaiei sind us bimaita.
þai ainai gawaurstwans sind þiudangardjos gudis, þaiei wesun mis du gaþrafsteinai.
COL 4.12 goleiþ izwis Aipafras, sa us izwis, skalks Iesuis Xristaus, sa sinteino usdaudjands bi izwis in bidom, ei standaiþ allawaurstwans jah fullawitans in allamma wiljin gudis.
COL 4.13 weitwodja auk imma þatei habaiþ manag aljan bi izwis jah bi þans þaiei sind...
COL 4.14 goleiþ izwis Lukas, leikeis sa liuba.
COL 4.15 goleiþ þans in Laudeikaia broþruns jah Nwmfan jah þo ingardjon is aikklesjon.
COL 4.16 jah þan ussiggwaidau at izwis so aipistaule, taujaiþ ei jah in Laudekaion aikklesjon ussiggwaidau, jah þoei ist us Laudeikaion, jus ussiggwaid.
saiƕ þata andbahti þatei andnamt in fraujin, ei ita usfulljais.

...1THESS 2.10 jah guþ, ƕaiwa weihaba jah garaihtaba jah unfairinodaba izwis þaim galaubjandam wesum, 1THESS 2.11 swaswe wituþ ainƕarjanoh izwara, swe atta barna seina, bidjandans izwis jah gaþlaihandans, 1THESS 2.12 jah weitwodjandans du gaggan izwis wairþaba gudis, saei laþoda izwis du seinai þiudangardjai jah wulþau.
